title: Newly Renovated Secluded and Spacious 3BDR
posting_body: New sleek designer 3BD-2BA upper flat never occupied.
Conveniently located on the North Oakland-Emeryville and Berkeley border.
This home features all stainless steel appliances, granite counter-tops, bamboo flooring and front and rear entry doors.
Unit has ample storage space, on-site laundry facilities, and high ceilings.
Unit has easy access to freeways and public transportation, and restaurants.
Unit is secluded for additional privacy.
This home exemplifies luxury living at the crossroads of three communities.
Unit will be available for viewing by appointment only.
If interested please contact Mr. Jones at
